titleInfo.title: Teleworkbench: A Remotely-Accessible Robotic Laboratory foe Education

mods.abstract: This paper presents a teleoperated robotic-laboratory named Teleworkbench and its benefit for educational purpose. It also presents briefly three issues that we need to take into consideration to make such a laboratory more effective.

titleInfo.title: Spring 2007 AAAI Symposium on Robots in AI and CS Education-Robots and Robot Venues: Resources for AI Education
